name: help
description: Information about the bot and a list of available commands.

name: set
description: Set/change  the username color using hex code or CSS color name.

name: check
description: Get color information (HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, Integer).

options.name: set
options.description: Set/change  the username color of the specific user using hex code or CSS color name. The command can only be executed by a user with administrator privileges.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove the username color of the specific user. The command can only be executed by a user with administrator privileges.

name: toprole
description: Set the top role for color roles. All color roles will be set under the indicated role.

name: embed
description: JSON to Discord embed conversion. The command can only be executed by a user with administrator privileges.
